Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Half-mast \Half"-mast`\ (-m[.a]st`), n. A point some distance below the top of a mast or staff; as, a flag a half-mast (a token of mourning, etc.). [1913 Webster]
half-mast n : a position some distance below the top of the mast to which a flag is lowered in mourning or to signal distress
